title: SADS Case Study Project (SDL)
description: This project involved setting up a network environment using CentOS, where I configured the SSH server to enable secure access to a client computer. The setup also involved DHCP for automatic IP address assignment and learning how to configure SSH for secure remote access. Software used: Oracle VM VirtualBox and CentOS 8 Linux.

title: Restaurant Review Website
description: A restaurant review platform with user authentication, review management, search, filters, and a Map API for locations. Users can only modify their own reviews. Software used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Map API.
features: Profile updates with drag-and-drop image upload

title: LOMA and DAVA PROJECT
description: This project involves analyzing data using KNIME flowchart for process automation, creating interactive dashboards using Power BI, and presenting data through reports. The project enhances data analysis workflows and offers interactive visualization of key insights. Software used: KNIME for process automation and Power BI for data visualization.
features: Power BI for visual data representation

title: Company Network Setup
description: This project involved setting up a company network where I assigned IP addresses to devices and configured them in Packet Tracer to ensure connectivity. All devices were coded to allow successful pings between them. Software used: Cisco Packet Tracer.
features: IP Addressing Table for efficient management
